resources.string: Tic Tac Toe needs to access your device location and uses bluetooth in order to discover and connect to nearby devices. Press \"ALLOW\" to proceed!
Are you sure you want to quit the current match?
Does the code matches the code displayed on the opponent screen? \n Code: %1s
Something went Wrong please press \"%1s\" button again!
Press the \"%1s\" button to start nearby opponents discovery and to make yourself discoverable for others
Press the \"%1s\" button to end nearby opponents discovery and to make yourself not discoverable for others
